title: #24: Religiot (Kurt Metzger, Ari Shaffir, Dog)
itunes:title: Religiot with Kurt Metzger
description: Kurt Metzger talks to me about his former religious lifestyle and how he feels about religion now. It's not positive. I recorded this at Kurt's apartment in Manhattan while his puppy was trying to bite our hands. We strayed about as far as I have off topic. But it was still one of the funniest episodes I've done.
